titleStmt.title: The last vvill and testament, of Sir Iohn Presbyter: vvho dyed of a new disease called, the particuler charge of the army. VVith divers admonitions and legacies left to his deare children of the Presbyterian Commons that have deserted the House: likewise to legions of perjur'd priests, residing in London, Westminster or else-where. VVith his life, death, and buriall. Also his epitaph.

The last vvill and testament, of Sir Iohn Presbyter: vvho dyed of a new disease called, the particuler charge of the army. VVith divers admonitions and legacies left to his deare children of the Presbyterian Commons that have deserted the House: likewise to legions of perjur'd priests, residing in London, Westminster or else-where. VVith his life, death, and buriall. Also his epitaph.
titleStmt.author: Presbyter, John, Sir.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeere of Iubilee, 1647.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
